sourcesContent:
import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; import "./AlbumDisplay.css"; const AlbumDisplay = ({ album }) => { return ( <> {/*
{`${album.title}`}
{album.artist}
{`Genre: ${album.genre}`}
{`Vendor: ${album.vendor}`}
{`Condition: ${album.condition}`}
{`Cost: ${album.cost}`}
{`Purchase Date: ${album.purchased}`}
{`Release Date: ${album.released}`}
*/}

{`${album.title}`}

{`Genre: ${album.genre}`}
{`Vendor: ${album.vendor}`}
{`Condition: ${album.condition}`}
{`Cost: ${album.cost}`}
{`Purchase Date: ${album.purchased}`}
{`Release Date: ${album.released}`}
{album.artist}
); }; export default AlbumDisplay;
